sense.name: scientific discipline
sense.commentary: a particular branch of scientific knowledge
sense.examples: The science of genetics is very interesting.

sense.name: skill
sense.commentary: activity that requires study and method
sense.examples: The skill of a well-trained boxer is clear when compared to an amateur. The sweet science of pugilism. Jack has pancake eating down to a science. "Sense grouping is more of an art than a science, right now." -Ben Snyder

sense.name: class
sense.examples: I had to run yesterday to get to science on time. Yesterday, in science, we learned about photosynthesis. Science was always my favorite class in high school. I have science right after lunch this year.
